author: Felipe Villamor
description: President Rodrigo Duterte of the Philippines claimed that China’s leader told him not to “force the issue” of oil drilling in disputed waters.
title: Duterte Says Xi Warned Philippines of War Over South China Sea

author: Manuel Mogato
description: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte said on Friday Chinese counterpart China Xi Jinping had warned him there would be war if Manila tried to enforce an arbitration ruling and drill for oil in a disputed part of the South China Sea.
title: Duterte says China's Xi threatened war if Philippines drills for oil

author: Jake Maxwell Watts
description: The Philippines President said his Chinese counterpart had threatened him that Beijing would “go to war” if Manila begins drilling for oil in the South China Sea.
title: Philippines’ Duterte Says Chinese Leader Raised Threat of War Over South China Sea

author: Al Jazeera
description: Philippine president says Chinese counterpart warned war would start if oil drilling began in disputed South China Sea.
title: Duterte: China's Xi threatened 'war' over sea oil

author: Enrico dela Cruz
description: A ban on smoking in public places in the Philippines has received broad support, with anti-tobacco activists hailing it as a victory and some smokers saying they were now prepared to kick the habit. Even an industry lobby group, the Philippine Tobacco Institute (PTI), said it supported the regulation and acknowledged the health objectives.
title: Rodrigo Duterte’s new smoking ban appears to be working

author: Karl Lester M Yap, Andreo Calonzo
description: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte said China threatened to go to war after he asserted the Southeast Asian nation’s sovereignty over disputed territory.
title: Duterte Says China's Xi Threatened War If He Pushed Sea Dispute
